languages.text: "Мое имя — Теодора фон Валанциус Массимо аф Скарус. Я — {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} на службе {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g} Человечества, и мои права и свободы подтверждены святейшей реликвией — {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Торговым Патентом{/g}, коий хранится на этом самом корабле. Мне дарована честь вступать во тьму за пределами Империума и нести свет Человечества туда, где царствуют злобные и еретические силы, грозящие всем нам смертью и погибелью".

traits.locale_text: "Мое имя — Теодора фон Валанциус Массимо аф Скарус. Я — {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} на службе {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g} Человечества, и мои права и свободы подтверждены святейшей реликвией — {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Торговым Патентом{/g}, коий хранится на этом самом корабле. Мне дарована честь вступать во тьму за пределами Империума и нести свет Человечества туда, где царствуют злобные и еретические силы, грозящие всем нам смертью и погибелью".

languages.text: "My name is Theodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. I am a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} of Humanity, and my rights and freedoms are vindicated by a most sacred relic — the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g} kept aboard this very vessel. Mine is the honour to venture into the darkness beyond the Imperium and carry Humanity's light where powers wicked and heretical reign and bode death and ruin to us all."

languages.text: “我的名字叫西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯·玛西摩·阿夫·斯卡鲁斯。我是一名{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，为人类的{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}服务。我的一切权力与自由，都是由这艘船上最神圣的圣物——{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易授状{/g}授予的。我很荣幸能够前往帝国之外的黑暗世界，将人类的光芒带到充满死亡与毁灭的异端世界。”
languages.original_text: "My name is Theodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. I am a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} of Humanity, and my rights and freedoms are vindicated by a most sacred relic — the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g} kept aboard this very vessel. Mine is the honour to venture into the darkness beyond the Imperium and carry Humanity's light where powers wicked and heretical reign and bode death and ruin to us all."

traits.locale_text: “我的名字叫西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯·玛西摩·阿夫·斯卡鲁斯。我是一名{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，为人类的{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}服务。我的一切权力与自由，都是由这艘船上最神圣的圣物——{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易许可证{/g}授予的。我很荣幸能够前往帝国之外的黑暗世界，将人类的光芒带到充满死亡与毁灭的异端世界。”

languages.text: «Me llamo Theodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. Soy {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} al servicio del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g} de la Humanidad. Mis derechos y libertades están justificados por una reliquia sagrada, la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente de Comercio{/g} que llevo en esta misma nave. Me corresponde el honor de adentrarme en la oscuridad más allá del Imperium y llevar la luz de la humanidad a donde los poderes malvados y herejes esperan para acarrearnos la muerte y la ruina».
languages.original_text: "My name is Theodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. I am a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} of Humanity, and my rights and freedoms are vindicated by a most sacred relic — the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g} kept aboard this very vessel. Mine is the honour to venture into the darkness beyond the Imperium and carry Humanity's light where powers wicked and heretical reign and bode death and ruin to us all."

traits.locale_text: «Me llamo Theodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. Soy {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} al servicio del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g} de la Humanidad. Mis derechos y libertades están justificados por una reliquia sagrada, la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente de Comercio{/g} que llevo en esta misma nave. Me corresponde el honor de adentrarme en la oscuridad más allá del Imperium y llevar la luz de la humanidad a donde los poderes malvados y herejes esperan para acarrearnos la muerte y la ruina».

languages.text: 「私の名前はシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス・マッシモ・アフ・スカルス。人類の{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}に仕える{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}であり、私の権利と自由は最も神聖な遺物、つまりこの船に保管されている{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}通商許可証{/g}によって証明されている。私は帝国の先にある暗闇に足を踏み入れ、私たち全員の死と破滅になりそうな邪悪な異端の権力に支配されている場所に、人類の光をもたらす使命を光栄に思う」
languages.original_text: "My name is Theodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. I am a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} of Humanity, and my rights and freedoms are vindicated by a most sacred relic — the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g} kept aboard this very vessel. Mine is the honour to venture into the darkness beyond the Imperium and carry Humanity's light where powers wicked and heretical reign and bode death and ruin to us all."

traits.locale_text: 「私の名前はテオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス・マッシモ・アフ・スカルスです。私は人類の{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}に仕える{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}であり、私の権利と自由は最も神聖な遺物、つまりこの船に保管されている{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}貿易令状{/g}によって証明されています。私は帝国の先にある暗闇に足を踏み入れ、邪悪な異端の権力が支配し、私たち全員に死と破滅の前兆をもたらす人類の光を運ぶことを光栄に思います」

「私の名前はシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス・マッシモ・アフ・スカルス。人類の{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}に仕える{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}であり、私の権利と自由は最も神聖な遺物、つまりこの船に保管されている{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}通商許可証{/g}によって証明されている。私は帝国の先にある暗闇に足を踏み入れ、私たち全員の死と破滅になりそうな邪悪な異端の権力に支配されている場所に、人類の光をもたらす使命を光栄に思う」

languages.text: « Je m'appelle Théodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. Je suis une {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} au service de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} de l'humanité, et mes droits et libertés sont garantis par une relique des plus sacrées : la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} qui se trouve à bord de ce vaisseau. J'ai l'honneur de m'aventurer dans les ténèbres au-delà des frontières de l'Imperium afin de porter la lumière de l'humanité là où règnent les puissances maléfiques et hérétiques qui nous promettent la ruine et la mort. »
languages.original_text: "My name is Theodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. I am a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} of Humanity, and my rights and freedoms are vindicated by a most sacred relic — the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g} kept aboard this very vessel. Mine is the honour to venture into the darkness beyond the Imperium and carry Humanity's light where powers wicked and heretical reign and bode death and ruin to us all."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'appelle Théodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. Je suis une {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} au service de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} de l'humanité, et mes droits et libertés sont garantis par une relique des plus sacrées : la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} qui se trouve à bord de ce vaisseau. J'ai l'honneur de m'aventurer dans les ténèbres au-delà des frontières de l'Imperium afin de porter la lumière de l'humanité là où règnent les puissances maléfiques et hérétiques qui nous promettent la ruine et la mort. »

languages.text: "Mein Name ist Theodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. Ich bin eine {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} in Diensten des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperators{/g} der Menschheit, und meine Rechte und Freiheiten werden gewährt von einem überaus heiligen Relikt – dem {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g}, der an Bord dieses Schiffs aufbewahrt wird. Ich habe die Ehre, in die Dunkelheit jenseits des Imperiums vorzustoßen und das Licht der Menschheit an Orte zu tragen, wo böse und ketzerische Mächte herrschen und uns alle mit Tod und Verderben bedrohen."
languages.original_text: "My name is Theodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. I am a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} in the service of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} of Humanity, and my rights and freedoms are vindicated by a most sacred relic — the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant of Trade{/g} kept aboard this very vessel. Mine is the honour to venture into the darkness beyond the Imperium and carry Humanity's light where powers wicked and heretical reign and bode death and ruin to us all."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Name ist Theodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. Ich habe die Ehre, in die Dunkelheit jenseits des Imperiums vorzustoßen und das Licht der Menschheit an Orte zu tragen, wo böse und ketzerische Mächte herrschen und uns alle mit Tod und Verderben bedrohen."

languages.text: "Adım Theodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. İnsanlığın {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparatoru'nun{/g} hizmetindeki bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'im{/g}. Haklarım ve hürriyetim ziyadesiyle kutsal olan bir yadigârla tasdiklenmiştir: Bu gemide saklı tutulan {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ticari Ruhsatname{/g} ile. İmparatorluk'un ötesindeki karanlığa girme, menfur ve kâfir güçlerin hüküm sürdüğü ve hepimiz için ölüm ve yıkımın habercisi olduğu yerlere İnsanlığın ışığını götürme şerefine nailim."
languages.original_text: "My name is Theodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. Mine is the honour to venture into the darkness beyond the Imperium and carry Humanity's light where powers wicked and heretical reign and bode death and ruin to us all."

traits.locale_text: "Adım Theodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. İnsanlığın {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator{/g}u'nun hizmetindeki bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'im. Haklarım ve hürriyetim ziyadesiyle kutsal olan bir yadigârla tasdiklenmiştir: Bu gemide saklı tutulan {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ticari Ruhsatname{/g} ile. languages.original_text: "My name is Theodora von Valancius Massimo af Scarus. I am a Rogue Trader in the service of the God-Emperor of Humanity, and my rights and freedoms are vindicated by a most sacred relic — the Warrant of Trade kept aboard this very vessel. Mine is the honour to venture into the darkness beyond the Imperium and carry Humanity's light where powers wicked and heretical reign and bode death and ruin to us all."
